devdoc.author: Chris Martin

addValue(bytes).details: adds the msg value to the value of the lockbox

breakLockBox(bytes,address,uint256).details: bypass redemption and immediately send the specified value to a chosen address

params.numAnswersRequired: number of correct answers required to unlock this lockbox
params.unlockingPeriod: number of blocks before redeemer can claim unlocked value

redeemLockBox(bytes,address,uint256).details: given that the lockbox is redeemable by the msg sender, sends specified amount to specified address

unlockLockBox(bytes,bytes).details: given the correct hash inputs for the answers, sets the sender as the redeemer of the lockbox

devdoc.title: A mechanism for locking eth behind m-of-n security questions

addValue(bytes).notice: Add value to an existing lockbox

breakLockBox(bytes,address,uint256).notice: Break the lockbox as the owner, sending the specified value to a chosen address

redeemLockBox(bytes,address,uint256).notice: Redeem a specified amount from an unlocked lockbox

unlockLockBox(bytes,bytes).notice: Unlock the lockbox, setting the msg sender as the redeemer
